example.text: Democrats’ runaway spending continues to fuel today’s high prices. [[user]] & Democrats refuse to cut spending even though the nation has blown past its limit. Families are worn out by Washington Democrats’ nonstop spending & worried about making ends meet. [[url]]

[[user]] voted to advance two of my bipartisan bills today. The Nuclear Fuel Security Act will rebuild America’s nuclear fuel supply chain. America’s Outdoor Recreation Act will increase access to the outdoors & boost our outdoor recreation economy. [[url]]

Reintroduced legislation to repeal the largest tax hike from the Democrats’ reckless tax and spending bill. Taxes like the book minimum tax undermine our supply chain, threaten our energy security, and send jobs and investment overseas. [[url]]
